Landing.name: Salvatore.
Landing.subtitle: I am a developer.
Landing.description: As a full-stack developer with a passion for ongoing learning and solving complex challenges, I strive to provide innovative and high-quality solutions in both front-end and back-end development. I am constantly seeking new opportunities and challenges that enable me to grow professionally.
